creditline: Gift of David and Mary Parker
description: two women and two children on steps in front of house; heavyset standing woman wearing plaid shirt, behind a chain link fence, at left; smiling boy with an umbrella seated on steps below woman in plaid; little girl wearing earrings and sweatshirt printed, "WASN'T ME", standing at center; seated young woman at right with jacket over her legs
title: Family on Steps, South Minneapolis
